QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, case when contrast != '' or contrast is not null then concat(concat(l."procedure",'|'), contrast) else l."procedure" end as source_value, case when procedure_date ilike 'yy%' or procedure_date ilike '%mm%' or procedure_date ilike '%dd' or procedure_date = '' or procedure_date is null then note_date else to_date(procedure_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD', FALSE) end as start_date, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, case when l."procedure"='computed tomography' and contrast='with' then 1073730 when l."procedure"='computed tomography' and contrast='with and without' then 4300757 when l."procedure"='computed tomography' and contrast='without' then 4163903 when l."procedure"='computed tomography' then 4300757 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance imaging' and contrast='with' then 4198856 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance imaging' and contrast='with and without' then 4013636 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance imaging' and contrast='without' then 4231864 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance imaging' then 4013636 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance spectroscopy' and contrast='with' then 4082847 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance spectroscopy' and contrast='with and without' then 4082847 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance spectroscopy' and contrast='without' then 4082847 when l."procedure"='magnetic resonance spectroscopy' then 4082847 when l."procedure"='positron emission tomography' and contrast='with' then 4305790 when l."procedure"='positron emission tomography' and contrast='without' then 4305790 when l."procedure"='positron emission tomography' then 4305790 when l."procedure"='single-photon emission computed tomography' and contrast='with' then 4019823 when l."procedure"='single-photon emission computed tomography' then 4019823 end as concept_id, findings, reasons FROM {sc}.alz_imaging l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
